result.name: Whole genome analysis for 163 guide RNAs in Cas9 edited mice reveals minimal off-target activity
result.description: In order to assess the risk of off-target mutagenesis associated with Cas9 mutagenesis, whole genome sequencing was applied to compare the genomes of 50 Cas9-derived founder mice to 28 untreated inbred control mice.
result.center: The Centre for Computational Medicine, Hospital for Sick Children, Toronto
